sentences.english: This sweltering summer of Chi Shangbin's legitimate discontent will not pass until there is an invigorating autumn of Doctor Zhu Guanghu.
sentences.chinese: 朱廣滬的朗朗秋日不到來，遲尚斌的酷暑就不會過去。

sentences.english: But the invective directed at Zhu by soccer fans on major websites was even more fierce.
sentences.chinese: 不過各大網站上球迷們針對朱廣滬的言詞更爲激烈。
